DOC.brief_title: Salvational Intervention Reducing AECOPD Under Severe Air Pollution
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , prospective , randomized standard treatment parallel control clinical trial . A total 764 stable COPD patient history exacerbation accord GOLD recruit equally divide two parallel group , salvational intervention group ( SI group ) control group ( CT group ) . The randomization stratify medical center random code design 1:1 ratio . The Department Respiratory Critical Care Peking University First Hospital responsible research . Other 10 unit participate study include Peking University Shougang Hospital , People 's Hospital Beijing Daxing District , Beijing Jingmei Group General Hospital , Beijing Miyun Hospital , Beijing Changping Hospital , The Hospital Shunyi District Beijing , Beijing Luhe Hospital Capital Medical University , Civil Aciation General Hospital , Beijing Jishuitan Hospital Aerospace 731 Hospital . These 11 center approximately cover area urban suburb Beijing . Inhaled tiotropium bromide ( 18ug ) , budesonide/formoterol（160ug/4.5ug）or tiotropium bromide ( 18ug ) + budesonide/formoterol （160ug/4.5ug）will use basic medicine . On foundation basic medicine , inhale budesonide/formoterol（160ug/4.5ug）will use intervention drug patient SI group . When air quality index ( AQI ) 200 , temporary add one inhalation budesonide/formoterol（160ug/4.5ug）twice day third day AQI drop 200 . CT group maintain original treatment . Besides baseline , patient formally visit 4 5 time trial : randomization ( need pharmacological washout ) every six month randomization . Primary outcome frequency AECOPD per year , define frequency AECOPD/the number patients/year . Secondary outcome include number unplanned outpatient visit , emergency medical visit , hospitalization , medical expense mortality cause AECOPD per year . The study protocol approve Peking University First Hospital Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) ( 2016 [ 1032 ] ) . Any protocol modification submit IRB review approval .
